1:
[[runners]]
  [runners.kubernetes]
    namespace = "{{.Release.Namespace}}"
    image = "ubuntu:20.04"
    [runners.cache]
      Type = "s3"
      Path = "runner"
      Shared = true
      [runners.cache.s3]
        ServerAddress = "${SECRET_MINIO_HOST}"
        BucketName = "gitlab-cache"
        BucketLocation = "minio"
        Insecure = false
        AuthenticationType = "access-key"
